name: PigeonSlayer
description:
PIGEON Slayer

Hey, wanna slay some pigeons? Welcome! Try to slash as much pigeons as possible before the time goes out!!!

Controls:

- use arrows to move and jump

- use space to slash some pigeons

You will get +1 sec for each slayed pigeon, but you will get -1 sec for each pigeon able to leave the screen alive.

The scene is quite empty but hey, I've done what I can for the jam, and I'm absolutly not an artist ;)

I'm already so proud of myself for having publish this... And wife likes it, so it's awesome! Feel free to post any comment or ask anything!
